archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0375
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product owner, I want the ability to link multiple base plans across accounts across Organisations, and discount accordingly, so that I can create bundled offers

properties.value: Based on the volume of subscriptions, but in this case for multiple customers Parked for customer hierarchy session. PC: Types of discounts to be clarified (for subscription fee, usage?), what rules for calculation should be applied

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
